text: Peace be on you, the wife of the beloved one of Allah,Peace be on you, the wife of the Commander of the Faithful,
Peace be on you, O Ummul Baneen Peace be on you, the mother of Abbas, son of Amir al-Mu’mineen, Ali ibn Abu Talib,
May Allah be pleased with you and make Jannat your home and resting place, with God’s mercy and blessings.
title: Lady Ummul Baneen (sa) - 1
